channel.description:

sorry about the size didn't know how to resize it but anyways i get these errors in npcoption1.java
im useing a z508 codeusa source
heres the code i added
[code] case 139: Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 5); //Robes p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have to click the '<trans=100>Player Stock' tab"); break;
case 137: Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 10); //Wc p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have to click the '<trans=100>Player Stock' tab"); break;
case 138: Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 8); //Weapon p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have to click the '<trans=100>Player Stock' tab"); break;
case 136: Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 7); //skillcapestore p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have to click the '<trans=100>Player Stock' tab"); break;code]
under switch statement
[code] switch (npcId) {[/code]
what am i doing wrong?

item.description:
@_Dj_Bigdadd wrote:

sorry about the size didn’t know how to resize it but anyways i get these errors in npcoption1.java

im useing a z508 codeusa source

heres the code i added

[code]
case 139:
Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 5); //Robes
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You have to click the ‘<trans=100>Player Stock’ tab”);
break;

	case 137:
	Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 10); //Wc
	p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have to click the '<trans=100>Player Stock' tab");
	break;

	case 138:
	Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 8); //Weapon
	p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have to click the '<trans=100>Player Stock' tab");
	break;

	case 136:
	Engine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 7); //skillcapestore
	p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You have to click the '<trans=100>Player Stock' tab");
	break;code]

under switch statement

	switch (npcId) {

what am i doing wrong?
